content: It seems that lld (using -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld) uses --as-needed by default, causing it not to include some c libraries which are needed. For example, I have a crate depending on https://github.com/Andlon/mkl-sys , which breaks when using -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld. I have made a PR which disables --as-needed when using lld here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/88814, but this approach is suboptimal since it includes unneeded libraries, as seen in the PR description. Any ideas?
